alert.note: Alert for Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 3:48AM EST until December 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mettawee River at Granville. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor flood stage. Widespread flooding of fields along the river. Water on Upper Turnpike Road and Gray Lane. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:31 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 5.5 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Mettawee River Granville Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Tue 3 am: 8.0 Forecast: Tue 7 am 7.7 Tue 1 pm 7.0 Tue 7 pm 6.6 Wed 1 am 6.4 Wed 7 am 6.2 Wed 1 pm 6.0 Wed 7 pm 5.9 Thu 1 am 5.8 Thu 7 am 5.7 Thu 1 pm 5.6 Thu 7 pm 5.5 &&
